CommonOption¶

class CommonOption(name: str)¶

Bases: object

Useful for giving a type to arguments when str just won’t cut it.

property name¶

The name of the option

Returns

The name of the option.

Return type

str

HasCommonOption¶

class HasCommonOptions(options: Dict[sims4communitylib.classes.options.CommonOption, Any])¶

Bases: object

Inherit this class to incorporate options into a class.

get_option(option: sims4communitylib.classes.options.CommonOption, default_value: Any = None) → Any¶

Retrieve an option.

Parameters

  • option (CommonOption) – The option to retrieve.

  • default_value (Any) – A default value to return when an option does not exist.

Returns

An option or the default value if not found.

Return type

Any

property options¶

Retrieve options.

Returns

A dictionary of options.

Return type

Dict[str, Any]

remove_option(option: sims4communitylib.classes.options.CommonOption)¶

Remove an option.

Parameters

option (CommonOption) – The option to delete.

set_option(option: sims4communitylib.classes.options.CommonOption, value: Any)¶

Set an option.

Parameters

  • option (CommonOption) – The option to set the value of.

  • value (Any) – The value to set an option to.
